name: Happy Survival
description:
Controls:

WASD - Move the player

Mouse - Control player's camera

E - Interact

Objective:

You found yourself in the middle of an industrial compound and have to find the exit. But beware, that are many zombies in the compound.

Hint 1: There are a few ammo packs scattered around the map, if ran out of ammo, try looking for them.
Hint 2: Follow the main road and it will lead you to the exit!

Source code:

https://github.com/HenryRocha/happy-survival

GDD:
